terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to CS2 Boost. By using our services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using CS2 Boost services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: CS2 Boost provides rank boosting services for Counter-Strike 2, including Premier Mode, Wingman, and Level Farming. Our professional boosters will help you achieve your desired rank while maintaining the security of your account.

account.title: 3. User Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

payment.title: 4. Payment Terms
payment.content: All payments must be made in advance before boosting services begin. We accept various payment methods including bank transfer, e-wallets, and other approved methods. All prices are displayed in VND unless otherwise specified.

user_obligations.title: 5. User Obligations
user_obligations.content: Users must not interfere with the boosting process once it has started. You agree not to share account access with third parties during the boost. Any violation may result in service termination without refund.

prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: Users are prohibited from: using our services for illegal purposes, attempting to defraud or manipulate our systems, sharing or reselling our services without authorization, providing false information, or engaging in any activity that could harm our platform or other users.

intellectual_property.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: All content, trademarks, and materials on CS2 Boost are owned by us or our licensors. You may not copy, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our written permission.

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided 'as is' without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee specific rank achievements as outcomes depend on various factors. We are not affiliated with Valve Corporation or Counter-Strike 2.

limitation.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: CS2 Boost shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid for the specific service in question.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our services at any time, with or without cause, and without prior notice. Upon termination, your right to use our services will immediately cease.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be effective when posted on this page. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our support channels or Discord server.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At CS2 Boost, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly, including: name, email address, phone number, payment information, and game account details necessary for our services. We also automatically collect certain information such as IP address, browser type, and device information.

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to: provide and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you about orders and updates, provide customer support, detect and prevent fraud, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with: trusted service providers who assist our operations, payment processors, and authorities when required by law. Our boosters only receive the minimum information necessary to complete your order.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and deliver personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. You may request deletion of your data, subject to certain exceptions.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to: access, correct, or delete your personal information, opt-out of marketing communications, request data portability, and withdraw consent where applicable. Contact us to exercise these rights.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us immediately.

international.title: 9. International Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through our website or email. The 'Last Updated' date at the top indicates when changes were made.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: For any privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact our Data Protection team through our support channels.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.intro: We want you to be completely satisfied with our services. This policy outlines our refund procedures and conditions.

eligibility.title: 1. Refund Eligibility
eligibility.content: You may be eligible for a refund if: the boosting service has not yet started, we are unable to complete your order due to our fault, or there are exceptional circumstances as determined by our support team.

full_refund.title: 2. Full Refund Conditions
full_refund.content: A full refund (100%) will be issued if: you cancel before any boosting work has begun, we cannot fulfill your order due to technical issues on our end, or the order is cancelled within 2 hours of placement and no work has started.

partial_refund.title: 3. Partial Refund Conditions
partial_refund.content: A partial refund may be issued based on the percentage of work completed. If 50% of the boost has been completed, you may receive up to 50% of the original payment. The exact amount is calculated based on progress made.

no_refund.title: 4. Non-Refundable Cases
no_refund.content: Refunds will NOT be issued if: the boosting service has been completed, you interfere with the boost process, you change your account password during boosting, your account is banned by Valve for reasons unrelated to our service, or you provided incorrect account information.

process.title: 5. Refund Process
process.content: To request a refund: 1) Contact our support team through the website or Discord. 2) Provide your order ID and reason for refund. 3) Wait for our team to review your request (usually within 24-48 hours). 4) If approved, refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days.

method.title: 6. Refund Method
method.content: Refunds are issued using the same payment method used for the original purchase. If this is not possible, we will work with you to find an alternative solution.

disputes.title: 7. Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: If you disagree with our refund decision, you may request a review by our management team. All decisions made after the review process are final.

promo_codes.title: 8. Promotional Orders
promo_codes.content: Orders placed with promotional codes or discounts may have different refund terms. The refund amount will be based on the actual amount paid, not the original price.

timeframe.title: 9. Refund Request Timeframe
timeframe.content: Refund requests must be submitted within 7 days of the order date or within 48 hours of order completion, whichever comes first.

contact.title: 10. Contact Support
contact.content: For refund requests or questions about this policy, please contact our support team. We are committed to resolving any issues fairly and promptly.
